sentences.english: The Fairmont chefs will start adding it to their foods.
sentences.chinese: 東昌廚師將開始將其添加到他們的食物。

sentences.english: He doesn’t know what a great cook I am.
sentences.chinese: 他還不知道原來我是一個很棒的廚師呢。

sentences.english: When proper guest is driven, chef and lackey leave suddenly however.
sentences.chinese: 正當客人駕到時，廚師和僕人卻突然離去。

sentences.english: First-time students will get one apron (one size) for free.
sentences.chinese: 第一次參加神風小廚師課程的學生可獲贈圍裙一條。

sentences.english: The cook pinches salt into the soup.
sentences.chinese: 廚師在湯裏放了一些鹽。

sentences.english: Anything you want when you're in charge of the kitchen as a professional chef.
sentences.chinese: 就是當你成爲一名專業廚師掌握廚房時想要的一切。

sentences.english: We want a cook, a library assistant and a sports coach.
sentences.chinese: 我們想找一個廚師，一個圖書館助理和一名體育教練。

sentences.english: A brother initiate who is a skilled chef demonstrates vegetarian cooking . vegetarian stuffed cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 烹飪課上，廚師師兄示範美味素食餐點的料理方法。

sentences.english: The cook will utilize the leftover ham bone to make soup.
sentences.chinese: 廚師要用喫剩的豬腿骨做湯。

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 廚師和雜貨商爲蛋的價格討價還價。

sentences.english: Would the best chefs be working that night?
sentences.chinese: 最好的廚師那天晚上會上班嗎？

sentences.english: Nacho was raised in a Mexican monastery and now he is the cook.
sentences.chinese: 奈奇在墨西哥的修道院中長大，現在則是裏面的廚師。

sentences.english: The chefs will work with school food-service workers, administrators and teachers.
sentences.chinese: 各廚師將與學校食品服務人員，管理人員和教師。

sentences.english: They stole my father’s cook the first day ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 他們第一天就把我父親的廚師偷跑了，”他說。

sentences.english: Kitchens will be staffed by a base of full-time chefs together with a stream of trainee chefs on work experience.
sentences.chinese: 廚房將配備專職廚師，還有一些實習生。

sentences.english: Man cook wanted. Must be thoroughly experienced and English-speaking.
sentences.chinese: 誠聘男廚師一名，經驗豐富，能說英語爲佳。

definition: master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
